title: Player Zombie
desc:
Post 1872
- Choose a place on the player list. Insert a host-controlled player with the title "(Player name)'s Zombie"
- Once played, take the top 5 cards on the discard pile (ignoring Player Zombie (1872) cards) and give a copy of each card to your Zombie
- Through events that target a player to draw cards, your Zombie draws base cards instead
- Every turn your zombie takes, their actions are decided randomly
- For every 3 cards your Zombie plays, gain 1 <:partisan:1107460550268559380>
